website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced Christmas tree stand that will support a tree that is up to 10 feet tall.
pros: The large base on this Christmas tree stand is manufactured using a durable plastic
Will hold approximately 1.5 gallons of water and has a lip to help catch tiny spills when filling
cons: The eye-bolt support system will require two people for set up

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: Interesting way of shipping... there was no box at all, just plastic wrapped. Due to this there are some scuffs but that won’t effect the product’s use. It looks like it’ll be good
customer_reviews.author: Acort

customer_reviews.title: No bolts/screws
customer_reviews.text: When the picture includes the bolts you expect the bolts to come with the product.
customer_reviews.author: redrunner89

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy! Cat proof!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and a dog and they were not able to knock over my tree on this stand. It held my tree perfectly without any issues and is made of good quality material with no issues for over a month while we had our tree up. For any cat owners who have had problems with their tree being knocked over this is the tree stand to get. All 4 of them couldn't knock this over!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My tree was not stable even though I made sure ...
customer_reviews.text: My tree was not stable even though I made sure all of the screws were tight. I am donating it now.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Held our 9ft Xmas tree perfectly....
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to use... Winding in the pins can be a little tiring on the hands but as long as you have someone or some way to support the tree while tightening them you should be all good.. We also have a funnel on a long tube that we bought in a Christmas shop somewhere that makes watering the tree (into the stand) a lot easier too...
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: This stand was amazing! Didn't have any issues with it
customer_reviews.text: I planned to get a 7 ft tree....although my husband came home with an 11 ft so initially i was terrified. This stand was amazing! Didn't have any issues with it. Takes time screwing it all in and after they are there a while when you remove the tree the bolts get stuck in the tree but overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive all the parts
customer_reviews.text: I only got 2 screws and the stand out of everything I was supposed to receive, not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Maya P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy holder for a big tree.
customer_reviews.text: This tree holder also holds a lot of water to keep your tree alive as long as possible. I also like that it has five bolts for centering and gripping the tree. It seems very strong, and I would expect it to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: snofan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. Piece of junk. The screws didn’t screw in, they came right out when the tree was put in. Even when tightened, they immediately came loose. Had to lean the tree up against the wall and throw the stand away. Junk. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: strudy and great color, easy to water
customer_reviews.text: Buy it now and save it for next year. Larger than what I expected, strudy and great color, easy to water. Good bang for the buck. Can hold a 10 foot+ tree.
customer_reviews.author: marianne s.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for small tree trunks! (6ft)
customer_reviews.text: We usually get a 6-8ft tree and the base never fits in a regular tree stand and falls over.. I tied several others before getting this one. The tiny trunk fit perfectly in the stand and it doesn't move around at all! Pricey, but worth it to not have to worry about the tree falling over!
customer_reviews.author: christy cieboter

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described and worked great for our 7.5 foot Christmas tree this year. The price is a little high in my opinion, but it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great, stable stand, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this tree stand. It's easy to use and very stable. Plus it holds a lot of water so I don't have to keep crawling under the tree every other day to water it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for several years now - they are the best!! Big deep reservir to keep that tree moist, and wide so the cat doesn't knock it over!!!
customer_reviews.author: cytronella

customer_reviews.title: A Stand Up Christmas Stand!!
customer_reviews.text: Held up a fresh cut 12ft tree at 5 in dia trunck quite well. Can hold a larger tree we are sure
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Hold a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to place my 9 foot tree. The bolts helped keep the tree straight. It holds a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Dari Desilva

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peazy
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up and place the tree. My tree was short but had larger trunk. My existing tree stand could not accommodate the bigger trunk so I ordered this stand. I added some cardboard pieces to secure the screws to the base of tree.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtyish Lady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable - 6 ft tall version
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy Christmas tree stand, given that it's just plastic. Although I bought the stand for a tree up to six feet tall, we got a tree that was eight feet tall and it fit just fine in the stand. The only thing was that it didn't hold as much water, since we got a larger tree. For the price, it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Overall served its purpose. Not very sturdy for our 6ft tree.
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Redneck tree stand
customer_reviews.text: The bolts do not close for the tree trunk to work in it. Out Christmas tree trunk was to small for the number and size of bolts they sent. We had to make it into a redneck tree stand, because of all the modifications we had to make!!!!😂
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base with large capacity water well.
customer_reviews.text: Anchor bolts offer a solid base and held a very tall tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice & kept our Xmas tree stable & secure.
customer_reviews.author: James Mends

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for our tree. When i took out ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our tree. When i took out the screws, the nuts stayed in the tree but it was just a matter of prying them out...which is to be expected with the pressure it was exerting for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer justis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for our first tree super easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Jill Giles

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stand. We've had it for 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand. We've had it for 2 years now. I was very hesitant in purchasing because of some of the reviews, but we've had no trouble with it! In fact, last year we had a giant 8.5ft tree and it held up just fine! We'll be using it again this year!
customer_reviews.author: Tara C.

customer_reviews.title: it's actually straight with this stand- the screws were easy to turn and seem to secure the tree nicely
customer_reviews.text: Every year our tree is crooked, it's actually straight with this stand- the screws were easy to turn and seem to secure the tree nicely. We have a 6 foot tree.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our first Christmas tree. I can’t wait to use it in years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its def bug enough.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty deep. It can hold a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple, straight foreword. I like the drip guard at the bottom. This is a nice aspect. I did find that when tightening the pegs down enough to resist, oh say a cat, that when I removed them the nuts were locked into the tree, requiring some digging because they became embedded in the trunk. Good size reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Justin I

customer_reviews.title: Nuts were not properly threaded.
customer_reviews.text: There are recessed nuts in the stand that the bolts must go through. Two of the nuts were stripped/improperly threaded so bolts would not go through. Destroyed one of the bolts trying to force through. Had to go to hardware store to match the nuts. Was expecting to just pop my tree in. It didn't go as planned. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: andrew goodman

customer_reviews.title: bad screw's
customer_reviews.text: Received this tree stand and when we went to set it up before we bought our tree 2 of the screws wouldn't go through due to the bolts in the stand being stripped...we had to make it work since it was to late to return it and get a new one. I was very displeased with the fact I couldn't use this stand how it is ment to be used. Next year we will be buying a different one from somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: knorton

customer_reviews.title: Good value, and it works
customer_reviews.text: Bolts to steady tree could have been a little longer, as the tree had a smaller trunk.. but it worked..
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D Smith

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect. funny enough, the place we bought our tree fum was selling the exact same one ($2 less) but they highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Stripped Bolts
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this tree stand. The bolts stripped the first time it was used so the weight of the (6ft) tree pushes the bolts back out and after repeated straightening and tightening the tree continues to lean to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why I would not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: The screws were loose and would not hold the tree and one of the screws was stripped
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This stand worked great for our 6ft tree
customer_reviews.text: This stand worked great for our 6ft tree. I love that it holds so much water. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: One of the screws was machined incorrectly. I had to take a power drill and basically redrill my own hole.
customer_reviews.author: joeboobus

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Had Read the Reviews First.
customer_reviews.text: The stand arrived on time but only came with 4 bolts which were not T-tipped per the description nor the photo. All bolts stripped the plastic holes and a 6 foot tree fell over in ten minutes. Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nut that held the tree in place came off, but overall okay. Much cheaper in big box store
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I must have received a factory reject. One of ...
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a factory reject. One of the eye bolts was forced into a hole and either stripped the bolt of hole threads. It wont move in or out. Also there were no flanges on the eye bolts as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy & great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - a bit challenging to stab a 6-7 foot tree trunk into the spikes, but held securely.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Quality could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Made of plastic that was too thin to support an average size tree. Quality could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelin P.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money don't buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this item. Unlike it says it does not support up to a 10 foot tree. I had a 9 foot tree in it and fell over 4 times breaking precious ornaments. Do not recommend it at all. Rating it 1 star is 1 star to many. Not a happy customer at all.
customer_reviews.author: NOT A HAPPY CAMPER

customer_reviews.title: Very Large
customer_reviews.text: I think I ended up with a size larger than I previously had. I holds tons of water, and it super easy to use to hold the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Reid M

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The tree stand is very sturdy. The metal one I had fell over under the weight of my tree, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Noslo Anitsirk

customer_reviews.title: holds up well
customer_reviews.text: the tree stand is as the picture and it does what it should. my tree is 9' tall and 6' wide but is steady in stand.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J. Aldean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Secure
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very easy to use. I used it for a 10 and a half foot tall Chtristmas tree and it was very secure. I like to test a stands stability by pulling and pushing on the tree when i first stand it up and this didnt move at all once i had it screwed in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kurpiers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too big and it arrived without any of the fasteners to hold the tree in. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: bf

customer_reviews.title: Slight Modification Needed
customer_reviews.text: With erasures used to tighten the screws allowing tight fit for very narrow artificial tree trunk, this stand is supporting my artificial tree with all lights in place for the coming years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Proud to say that this holder has been perfect. My tree didn't budge at all and is very easy to set up. Highly recommend if you are getting a tree within its limits.
customer_reviews.author: RH23

customer_reviews.title: It Works for Us
customer_reviews.text: What a relief to get rid of the metal tree stand.
customer_reviews.author: pablito

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Christmas tree and couldn't be happier with my purchase. Does what it's supposed to and because it holds about a gallon of water your tree will need less watering.
customer_reviews.author: Diqui

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work Out
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, but the pieces did not fit. Have to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect and a great price , way better than I expected! I got its quick too and can't wait to find and put the tree up on friday!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Helterbran

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be perfect for the big tree we got but there was ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be perfect for the big tree we got but there was a bolt missing which was very frustrating. Thank god home Depot had a perfect match
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pay more
customer_reviews.text: its good but I saw it for 10 bucks I was over charge
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: This was great! There was even room in the bottom to ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to hold up my May pole. I cheated and used PVC pipe for the pole. This was great! There was even room in the bottom to add pebbles for added weight. We still had to fight the wind to stay upright but since this has holes in the rim, an addition of a few ground anchors would have easily solved that issue. What is also great is that I could by it here in May! Probably confused the heck out of the seller. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 5 ft tree and it was perfect. My tree was secure and easy to water
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 5 ft tree and it was perfect. My tree was secure and easy to water. It has a little lip on the bottom that caught my spills. The biggest benefit was that it held enough water to keep my tree watered while I went away for a week. Its kind of big, but easily covered by a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped without the eye-bolts. Otherwise, it is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A solid buy - good price and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made tree stand that was easy to set up and was great for the real Christmas tree this year. It should last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Q.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The products was delivered without the bolts and end-caps. Therefore, it is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: TTD

customer_reviews.title: A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Its 5 bolts and a piece of injection molded plastic. It could have shipped pre-assembled as it wouldn't have added to the package's footprint in any way. It did only take 5 minutes to put together, but for the price it would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I received a "returned" item that was resold. One of the bolts was missing. Very difficult to use. Broke after one use. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I also found a stand that has two screws on each side making it easier to get the tree straight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura O

customer_reviews.title: I anchored an 8' tree and the next day the ...
customer_reviews.text: I anchored an 8' tree and the next day the tree fell over. The plastic around the screw bolts had ripped and could no longer hold the tree. The molded plastic needs to be denser to support the tree and the bolts. I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jack-Post Oasis Christmas Tree Stand.
customer_reviews.text: The product is corret for the natural christmas tree, and his material are first quality and very fine paint,also the screwdrivers
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

customer_reviews.title: have no idea if it works because it came with only the base
customer_reviews.text: so none of the screws or end caps. Totally worthless and now I cannot get my tree for another week!
customer_reviews.author: EAfonso

customer_reviews.title: For large trees only!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE! The description, including dimensions, does not begin to describe the size of this stand. Once word of caution - it is NOT a universal tree holder. If the trunk is too small (I.E. less than4 inches in diameter), this will not work. The metal posts only screw in so far, and will not hold up a smaller tree.
customer_reviews.author: Cherralene Peer

customer_reviews.title: It's a pain!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this stand. I got it because of the price and that it was made in USA. The 5 tightening prongs are 1) too numerous and unnecessary and 2) so tight in the plastic that they are REALLY hard to turn. The metal pieces at the end get stuck in the tree and assuming you have to adjust to get the tree straight, come out when you unscrew them. It's awful and caused a lot of arguing while putting up our tree.
customer_reviews.author: mkp

customer_reviews.title: Large Water Capacity a Big Plus
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the large reservoir allowing this stand to hold a lot of water. My only problem with it was that I had a very small tree, so the set screws didn't go in far enough to secure the trunk. Thus, I had to pad them with some of the cardboard packing material. Thus, it worked with some modifications, but not optimum. For a larger tree it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: 5X Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I'm 25 yrs old and I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm 25 yrs old and I bought my first live X-mas tree in winter of 2016. My tree was nearly 6 ft tall. This stand held the tree better than expected, and I would trust it with an even larger tree (follow the product recommendations). If you'r looking to buy a real tree this affordable tree stand will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: says it's for up to 10ft trees, but my 8.5ft tree continues to tip over. the screw clamps have a small nut at the end which should allow larger surface area to grip the tree, however the nuts are too small and just bore holes into the tree - which would be fine if that helped the tree stand straight. but it doesnt. we have strings tying the tree to the wall, and even then it's crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Has a hard time with smaller trees
customer_reviews.text: Cons: If you have a smaller tree it's going to have a hard time keeping it centered and upright. The ends of the bolts are simply nuts with their last thread bent to prevent you from screwing them all the way on. They don't stay on very well especially if you're trying to adjust thing. The bolts are also very thin. Although they have a hard time keeping a small centered, I'm not sure how they'd do with a big tree considering how small they are. Pros: It does hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Keith William

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive tree stand option
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tree stand for our first real tree. Pretty standard tree stand with basic bolts securing trunk. Easy to use and had the tree up and looking perfect in no time. I don't really know why anyone would need an expensive tree stand as this worked out perfectly for our needs. If I had any complaints it would be that the base is a little thick so that the tree skirt doesn't lay perfectly but definitely not too big of an issue and wouldn't prevent me from using again. The thick plastic will probably ensure quality use for many, many years. Overall, I say you can't go wrong for about $20
customer_reviews.author: B. Sand

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure what height of trees you will use to choose correct model of the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Just make sure what height of trees you will use to choose correct model of the stand. Also, please find in the box a plastic bag with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Komov

customer_reviews.title: Missing all bolts
customer_reviews.text: Missing the 5 eye bolts and 5 steel end caps. Only came in a boss with stand, no hardware. Returning if not remedied.
customer_reviews.author: jcfromkc

customer_reviews.title: This stand was extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this stand because of the negative reviews, but the low price encouraged me. This stand was extremely easy to use, I was able to put the tree up, without help, and the tree is very secure in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Holds water for days
customer_reviews.text: Great tree stand. Held water where I didn't have to fill it every day and I had an 8' tall fat fraser fur about a 6" trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Brutality

customer_reviews.title: but at first impression the stand seems to be very sturdy. I was able to take the stand to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use with a tree yet since it is not Christmas for a few more months, but at first impression the stand seems to be very sturdy. I was able to take the stand to the shop and weld the nut ends that they give you. I am hoping that this helps with some of the complaints that others had regarding them.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly because of the cost. I was impressed with the simplicity of it and ease of setting it up. I used it to hold a 7ft tree. The bolts and the nuts they thread through are both steel. It also has a lip at the base which is nice in case you over pour the water, so that it doesn't get your carpet wet. Overall this was a great purchase for the cost. I will use it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Needs some minor tweaks.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the part that touches the tree wasn't a screw head turned backwards. It comes off or gets stuck in the tree when removing the tree from the stand. A permeant fitting would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 1st Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Used for our 6ft Christmas tree and were totally satisfied ♡
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: just what needed
customer_reviews.text: held the 6" tree with no issues. Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: n c c

customer_reviews.title: totally pleased
customer_reviews.text: very well made and has a large water capacity bolts and nuts are not a cheap grade but probably grade 5 American great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: WLL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a lot bigger than I expected. I plan on replacing with something smaller and returning this.
customer_reviews.author: DaveF

customer_reviews.title: would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love how deep it is. We only had to fill it with water just a couple of times throughout the season!
customer_reviews.author: Elise N

customer_reviews.title: does the job as intended
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, just a week old the tree I got was approximately 5.5 ft and it fits in there, but I really wouldn't go smaller than that
customer_reviews.author: Mike z

customer_reviews.title: Very substantial product that hold tree securely.
customer_reviews.text: Really works very well for our 6' tree. Easy to assemble and holds the tree securely so it does not need to be ancored.
customer_reviews.author: Family Customer

customer_reviews.title: oh christmass tree
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and would recommend it to anyone who loves real tree's. Worked great this year and i'm sure the next as well..easy to tighten when the tree is set in place.I bought a 8' foot tree to use it with and it held up fine...
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Big and sturdy, worked great for 7' tree. Looking for a stand, this one worked great, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great for a real thick stump
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice stand, but doesn't fit a fake tree too well with a 1.5" diameter. The support screws don't extend far enough.
customer_reviews.author: Giah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If you have a live tree, then is a must. Holds tree securely and lots of water to minimize watering. Great
customer_reviews.author: WBS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't come with all screws and items needed to properly install stand. I didn't have a problem providing the tools due to being a handy man, however next time please include all pieces necessary to complete the set up.....
customer_reviews.author: Audrey LaBoard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice steel tab on bottom to keep the base from sitting flat on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jjs37

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't tell you if it worked or not, because it shipped without the bolts. Pretty frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Samma Lamma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fast delivery, can't wait to get my tree!!
customer_reviews.author: vanderson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy tree stand
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of them that I have used at photos shoots over and over. I put 10 foot trees in them and they stand up with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Conley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the same price that was on black friday, product works fine
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Neal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. You cannot fit a regular tree skirt around it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sligar

customer_reviews.title: Does a stand up job  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a real tree this year. This stand is perfect for a 6-7 footer. Easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: JACK-POST Oasis Christmas Stand, for Trees Up to 10-Feet, 1.5-Gallon Water Capacity, Large, Green
product_meta.description: Size:LargeJACK-POST Oasis Christmas Tree Stand, for Trees Up to 10-Feet, 1. 5-Gallon Water Capacity
feature_bullets: This are Garage storage and organization system hardware
5-eye bolt 1. 5-Gallon Plastic Christmas Tree Stand. Use for up to a 10-foot tree, 6. 75-inch trunk and has an 21. 5-inch base. 5-inch bare trunk needed. Steel spike base plate for added stability.
5 T-nut tipped eye-bolts thread through steel nuts for strength, to hold the tree securely and for smooth operation. Corrosion-resistant 'gold tone' zinc-dichromate hardware,
Made of plastic with a spill catcher edge.
5-eye bolt 1.5-Gallon Plastic Christmas Tree Stand. Use for up to a 10-foot tree, 6.75-inch trunk and has an 21.5-inch base. 5-inch bare trunk needed. Steel spike base plate for added stability.
5 T-nut tipped eye-bolts thread through steel nuts for strength, to hold the tree securely and for smooth operation. Corrosion-resistant 'gold tone' zinc-dichromate hardware,
Made of plastic with a spill catcher edge.
